titles.title: Keeping American Businesses Competitive Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum corporate rate of tax to 22 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/4/2010--Introduced. Keeping American Businesses Competitive Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the maximum income tax rate on corporations, including personal service corporations, from 35 to 22%.
